name: Bitsy Bongo Cat: Now with Sound!
name_original: Bitsy Bongo Cat: Now with Sound!
description:
Choose a music/sound option then play with bongocat. 

Just tap the Arrow Keys or use wasd to play.

Each Arrow Key is a different instrument.

If you want to try different music/sound options you gotta restart the game by reloading the page unfortunately.

Info

Bitsy Game Engine by Adam Le Doux

Bitsy Hacks used with Borksy(AYolland): Exit from dialogue (mildmojo), Solid items (Sean Leblanc), Bitsymuse (David Mowatt)

Bitsy Discord: Where I get my memes

Music:

Track1: "John Cena Opera Theme", a parody cover by Crazy Boris  used for an  animated skit.

Track2: "Distance (Bicycle Trip)", composed by Yoh Ohyama of Asturias for the collaboration album "The Black Box" by Aivi Tran and surasshu.

Sounds:

Bongo, Thump, and Meow sounds are from Freesound. Keyboard sound is taken from a sound sample from the free music making platform LMMS.

Sounds and music edited using Audacity.
